data.message: Hi , I would like to know what can I do to delete my other two account as I didn't want to use it anymore but I have forgotten the emails that I used to sign up for the account 。

replies.message: Hi Joyce. You may be able to get back into your Facebook account by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2buy7A1. Once you've gained access to the accounts, you can permanently delete them by visiting: http://bit.ly/2buzsXk. Please keep in mind, it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -Jessica

Or can you guys help me to delete it as the account didnt show any related email which makes me really frustrated to sign in ... I used to create another account to avoid some personal issues . Anyway thanks for the reminder

Facebook ohhhh no joyce! do not do it that way...lost my best acct. that way... u give 3 names of friends on f.b have them call you..if they dont ur stuck 4-ever with that retrieval process. ur stuck,my sis never called me so thats that!
spent alot of time and MONEY on that acct. imiss it still c it but no password..4-got it!
